titles.title: Green Mountain National Forest Adjustment Act of 2005
A bill to adjust the boundaries of Green Mountain National Forest.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: 3/17/2005--Introduced. Green Mountain National Forest Adjustment Act of 2005 - Modifies the boundaries of the Green Mountain National Forest to include all parcels of land identified in the forest maps entitled "Green Mountain Expansion Area Map I" and "Green Mountain Expansion Area Map II", each dated February 20, 2002. Provides for the boundaries of Green Mountain National Forest, as adjusted by this Act, to be considered to be the boundaries of such National Forest as of January 1, 1965, for the purposes of provisions relating to the allocation of land and water conservation funds for Federal purposes pursuant to the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965.
